mapper.select: select b.customer_name, b.customer_cert_num, a.contract_code, c.loan_flag from jk.t_jk_loan_info c LEFT JOIN jk.t_jk_loan_customer b ON b.loan_code=c.loan_code LEFT JOIN jk.t_jk_contract a ON a.loan_code=c.loan_code LEFT JOIN jk.t_jk_reconsider_apply d on d.loan_code = c.loan_code where d.apply_id=#{applyId}

select a.contract_code contractCode, b.customer_name customerName, a.grant_amount grantAmount, c.loan_flag loanFlag, c.loaninfo_oldornew_flag, b.customer_cert_num customerCertNum, c.loan_urgent_flag urgentFlag, c.loan_code loanCode from jk.t_jk_loan_info c LEFT JOIN jk.t_jk_loan_customer b ON b.loan_code=c.loan_code LEFT JOIN jk.t_jk_loan_grant a ON c.loan_code=a.loan_code where c.loan_code=#{loanCode}
select loan_code from t_jk_contract where apply_id = #{applyId}
select bank_signing_platform from t_jk_loan_bank b left join t_jk_loan_info a on a.loan_code=b.loan_code and b.bank_top_flag='1' and repayment_flag = '0' where a.loan_code = #{loanCode}
mapper.update:
update jk.t_jk_loan_info
loan_flag=#{loanFlag},
frozen_reason=#{frozenReason},
frozen_code=#{frozenCode},
frozen_last_apply_time=#{frozenLastApplyTime},
where
and loan_code=#{loanCode}
and apply_id=#{applyId}
update t_jk_payback set effective_flag='1', dict_pay_status = '0' where contract_code=#{contractCode}

update jk.t_jk_loan_grant
loan_code = #{loanCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mid_id = #{midId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dict_loan_type = #{dictLoanType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dict_loan_way = #{dictLoanWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
grant_amount = #{grantAmount,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
grant_pch = #{grantPch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
grant_batch = #{grantBatch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
submissiondate = #{submissionsDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
grant_fail_amount = #{grantFailAmount,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
lending_time = #{lendingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
lending_user_id = #{lendingUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
grant_recepic_result = #{grantRecepicResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
grant_fail_result = #{grantFailResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
grant_back_mes = #{grantBackMes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
check_emp_id = #{checkEmpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enterprise_serialno = #{enterpriseSerialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
grant_count = #{grantCount,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
check_result = #{checkResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
check_time = #{checkTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
submit_deduct_time = #{submitDeductTime,jdbcType=DATE},
grant_back_date = #{grantBackDate,jdbcType=DATE},
cf_send_flag = #{cfSendFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trust_grant_output_status = #{trustGrantOutputStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trust_cash_rtn= #{trustCashRtn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trust_cash_failure = #{trustCashFailure,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_id = #{modifyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gold_credit_status = #{goldCreditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zcj_reject_flag = #{zcjRejectFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
grant_flag = #{grantFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where
and contract_code=#{contractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and loan_code=#{loanCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select loan_flag from t_jk_loan_info where loan_code = #{loanCode}

select count(*) from jk.t_jk_loan_info where frozen_flag = '1' and loan_code in
#{loanCodes}
mapper.delete: delete from jk.t_jk_loan_grant a where a.loan_code=#{loanCode}
mapper.select: select contract_code,loan_code,dict_loan_type,mid_id,grant_fail_amount, dict_loan_way,grant_amount,lending_time,lending_user_id,grant_recepic_result, grant_fail_result,grant_back_mes,check_emp_id,check_result,check_time from jk.t_jk_loan_grant where contract_code = #{contractCode}
select distinct product_name as productName, product_code as productCode from jk.t_gl_jk_product

select a.contract_code, c.loan_customer_name as customer_name, a.grant_amount, c.dict_loan_flag, d.card_bank, c.loan_code from jk.t_cj_loan_info c LEFT JOIN jk.t_jk_loan_grant a ON a.loan_code=c.loan_code LEFT JOIN jk.t_cj_customer_bank_info d ON d.loan_code=c.loan_code where c.apply_id=#{applyId}
select a.apply_id from jk.t_cj_loan_info a LEFT JOIN jk.t_cj_contract c ON c.loan_code=a.loan_code where c.contract_code=#{contractCode}
select id from jk.t_gl_user where id = #{userCode} and del_flag = '0' and status = '1'
select distinct grant_batch as grantBatch from t_jk_loan_grant where grant_batch is not null
